item.title: BEC Book
item.description: â€œBicycle Explorers Club: Photography + Stories of Bicycle Touring is a rare 4th wave coffee table book to impress your outdoorsy friends who only shop at REI and drive a Subaru. It consists of photography taken from the slow lane, pictures from bicycle tours, bikepacking and country day rides. Through these metaphysical bicycle rides, clarity of thought moved to the forefront of the cerebral cortex and those lessons and stories are documented within.
